metadata.synopsis: This AD plays when Chop spots Us the intellect devourer outside of his cage, without seeing a player nearby to arrest.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe morgue_us" and "oe COL_Butcher", in either order- Walk close to Us' cage door- Use command "select S_COL_Morgue_Cage_Us" and "unlock" - Us should start following you- Use command "select player" and "statusapply GREATER_INVISIBILITY 10"- Walk towards the corpse chute to make Us follow you and get spotted outside of its cage, without the player or anyone else in the party being visible- Chop will turn hostile on Us and say this AD

0.speaker: Chop
0.text: No! Bad kitty! Back in cage!
